# Order

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

| Class               | Support     |
| ------------------- | ----------- |
| `order-1`           | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `order-2`           | ğŸŒ Web only |

| `order-12`          | ğŸŒ Web only |

| `order-last`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `order-none`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
